sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of McDonald's ( MCD ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.5%.
Year to date, McDonald's registers a 5.6% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Pfizer ( PFE ), trading down 0.7%.
Pfizer Inc is lower by about 5.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are JPMorgan Chase & Co. ( JPM ), trading down 0.7%, and Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading up 0.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
